name: Bellakath
description: '''Katherinne Huerta''' (born October 5, 1997), known professionally as '''Bellakath''', is a Mexican singer, songwriter and record producer. She started releasing music in 2020 and went viral after the release of her singles, "Gatita" in 2022 and "Reggaeton Champagne" (with [[Dani Flow]]) in 2023. On October 5, 2023, she released her first studio album ''Kittyponeo''.
